snippet.title: Golden Lap - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Rev up your strategic mind in the golden era of motorsport with Golden Lap! Race, tune, triumph! Climb the ranks! Minimalist style, maximum strategy!

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2052040/Golden_Lap

Step into the polished shoes of a racing team manager in the heart-stirring Golden Era of motorsport where every decision can lead to glory or gravel. With sleek minimalist charm and deep strategic gameplay, Golden Lap offers a unique experience in the motorsport management genre.

Website: https://www.funselektor.com/goldenlap
Discord: https://discord.gg/kcVbHR9
Twitter: https://twitter.com/funselektor
Instagram: https://instagram.com/funselektor
Strelka Games: https://twitter.com/StrelkaGames
